name: react-broker
description: Component lazy-loading + code splitting that works with SSR, Webpack 4, and Babel 7
author: Jared Lunde

scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:es: npm run build-lazy:es && npm run build-macro:es
scripts.build:cjs: npm run build-lazy:cjs && npm run build-macro:cjs
scripts.build-lazy:es: rimraf es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src/lazy --out-dir es && npm run prettier:es
scripts.build-lazy:cjs: rimraf cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src/lazy --out-dir cjs && npm run prettier:cjs
scripts.build-macro:es: rimraf macro && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src/macro --out-dir macro && npm run prettier-macro:es
scripts.build-macro:cjs: rimraf cjs.macro && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src/macro --out-dir cjs.macro && npm run prettier-macro:cjs
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel ./src -w --out-dir es
